Articles.Content:
Hi! My name is Ben and I'm a rocket scientist.

No really, I am. I have degrees in physics and I work for Johns Hopkins University's Applied Physics Lab.

I picked up KSC back in the beta for a while but didn't stick with it because my computer at the time was having problems keeping up with it. Now that KSC is out of beta (and I have a new computer) I'm back into things. I've been reading the forums for a while and I'm looking forward to joining the community.

B^)

Hi BenCushwa. We have several real space guys on the forum.

I am not one of them. :)

Likewise, I'm not a space guy, but some relatives might think I'm ... spacey. :confused:

Welcome BenCushwa. Its you space types that probably keep the rest of us in "reality check". Happy crash --, er, flying/ roving/ boating/ landing!

Hello BenCushwa, and welcome to the forum!

It's intriguing and pleasing to welcome a [I]real[/I] rocket scientist into our community. I hope you like it here.

Happy landings!

Welcome to KSP.
And KSC of course, although you'll find it a little limiting there.
